<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_570217_bacheca_1.GetTipoUtenteReview</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetTipoUtenteReview</name><script><![CDATA[var GetTipoUtenteReview = Class.create();
GetTipoUtenteReview.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
getUtente: function(){
    var userRecord = new GlideRecord('x_570217_bacheca_1_utente');
	userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_number'));
	return userRecord.mail_review;
		},
    type: 'GetTipoUtenteReview'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-31 14:50:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>3fa246a12f8aa8108fbcd0e62799b6ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetTipoUtenteReview</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Bacheca 1" source="x_570217_bacheca_1">a6d003f02f8e28108fbcd0e62799b6dc</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Bacheca 1">a6d003f02f8e28108fbcd0e62799b6dc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3fa246a12f8aa8108fbcd0e62799b6ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-31 14:54:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
